body.description: Nature Made Chewable Vitamin C 500 mg is a dietary supplement that helps support immune health, provides antioxidant support, and aids in iron absorption. Sourced from high-quality ingredients, this Vitamin C supplement has delicious orange-flavored Vitamin C chewable tablets with no color added and no artificial flavors. This is an antioxidant supplement with 500mg Vitamin C for adults. One Vitamin C tablet provides Vitamin C 500mg to support collagen synthesis and overall skin health. Adults, chew one Nature Made 500 mg Vitamin C tablet daily with a meal. Nature Made Vitamin C chewable supplements are quality you can trust. USP has tested and verified ingredients, potency, and manufacturing process. Made in the USA with quality global ingredients. USP sets official standards for dietary supplements. Visit the USP verified website for more information. *Based on a survey of pharmacists who recommend branded vitamins and supplements.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DAILY IMMUNE SUPPORT† Vitamin C is an antioxidant that supports the immune system and helps neutralize free radicals in the body.† SUPPORTS COLLAGEN SYNTHESIS† Vitamin C is necessary for the body to produce collagen, which helps support healthy skin.† 1 DAILY CHEWABLE TABLET FOR ADULTS Featuring a delicious orange flavor, adults, chew 1 tablet daily with a meal. Store tightly closed, in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS Guaranteed to meet our high-quality standards. Made from carefully selected ingredients under strict manufacturing processes. No color added, no artificial flavors.

Understanding Vitamin C Vitamin C (also known as ascorbic acid) is a water-soluble essential nutrient that your body needs to consume and replenish every day. Vitamin C is found in citrus fruits like oranges, lemons, grapefruit, and limes. It’s also found in tomatoes, red peppers, broccoli, and strawberries. Almost 50% of U.S. adults are not getting enough Vitamin C through their daily food intake (1). If you just want to make sure you’re getting what your body needs, Vitamin C supplements may help. (1) Reider, Carroll A et al. “Inadequacy of Immune Health Nutrients: Intakes in US Adults, the 2005-2016 NHANES.” Nutrients vol. 12,6 1735. 10 Jun. 2020, doi:10.3390/nu12061735 Vitamin C plays an important role in supporting the immune system. As an antioxidant, it helps neutralize free radicals in the body, and it may help aid in iron absorption in the body, too.†

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love that they are chewable, and delicious!
reviews.reviewText: I will always select the chewable C over the standard pill form. These are a pleasure to take. These are strong enough that I don't have to take one every day, I skip a day, so they are efficient to use. Plus they are a very good deal. Thanks. Kem. 12/4/23

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Being an excellent antioxidant and also an essential element for collagen formation, I was looking for a delicious way, in addition to the consumption of citrus fruits, to complete the daily requirement of vitamin C and this product does it. It is the 6th bottle I have bought and I recommend it. It also has a delicious flavor.No seasonal cold events in the last year (and I assume it is due to the protection of vitamin C.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No bitter or chalky taste
reviews.reviewText: NatureMade vitamins for me work very well. I'm 65yrs very very soon-to-be 66yrs. Ok, had a surgical procedure 1998 & was given pain meds & after was Unable to relive stool for little over a week. I've done either one or multiple of these heart-healthy exercises in one single day everyday from 1987-2010 (gym-rat, cyclyst, jogger, paddle all/handball player, roller skater, & swimmer) and not one time did I hear or read just how crucial Vitamin C is for our bodies inside & outside. Confided to a friend & was suggested to take Vitamin C, appx 1,000mg per day. He said, which I later read to be a fact, that the Vitamin C will relieve my issue but also was told just how important Vitamin C is for our system & should be taken each day just like our multivitamin.So NatureMade was my multivitamin & I loved it so it made easy sense for me to add my C vitamin with the same brand. I take all chewable vitamins because I have a mental problem swallowing pills & these C's do not taste chalky or bitter. I usually chew 3 per day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered as promised.
reviews.reviewText: These vitamin C tablets are great. They taste well and break down nicely. I am pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too bad it's so sugary
reviews.reviewText: It's a good amount of vitamin C in each chewable tablet: 500mg. That's why it's the best one. If you've tried Kirkland from Costco, this one is way way way better. I just wish they'd decrease the sugar a fair amount. It seems counter productive to make a Vitamin C that many use as preventative and others use as maintenance -- just to add so much sugar. Sugar feeds Inflammation and virus. I'll keep buying it unless I find a better one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Vitamin C is needed for the absorption of other vitamins so its slim form makes it easier to swallow with other vitamins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this version of vitamin c better to reduce my candy eating habits. Delicious vitamins!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasty; no color or artificial flavors added
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a reasonably priced, tasty, chewable Vitamin C that is made in the United States. This one is all that, plus it has no colors or artificial flavors added. It is disc-shaped and about the size of a nickel. It is easy to chew and goes down easily.
